mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_master (nm, product_code, rdt, icpu, igpu, ram, size, weight, brand, os, img) VALUES (#{nm}, #{product_code}, #{rdt}, ${icpu}, ${igpu}, ${ram}, ${size}, ${weight}, #{brand}, #{os}, #{img})
INSERT INTO t_product_detail (iproduct, color, hdd, ssd, price, stock, isrep, dc_rate, img) VALUES (${iproduct}, #{color}, ${hdd}, ${ssd}, ${price}, ${stock}, #{isrep}, ${dc_rate}, #{img})
